thread.title: US helicopter company lets tourists take stomach-churning ‘shoe selfies’
thread.title_full: US helicopter company lets tourists take stomach-churning ‘shoe selfies’

author: Steven Zussino
title: US helicopter company lets tourists take stomach-churning ‘shoe selfies’
text:
I just came back from New York and these photos are incredible! 
Having 2 toddlers I didn’t do any exhilarating tours but it is an incredible city. Aerial photography company FlyNYON are giving brave individuals the chance to take stomach-churning pictures of their legs hanging out of an open-door helicopter above famous New York landmarks. You can also get shoe selfies in Miami! The shot – known by the company as a ‘shoe selfie’– has become a huge hit, with limbs being snapped over the likes of the Empire State Building, Central Park, Times Square and Freedom Tower. Shoe Selfie over downtown Manhattan! 
Would you ever try this?
